title: Companion Approval Guide
content: le, Convince the Flind to eat herself Find the Missing Shipment Requirement/s: Flind must be convinced to attack her pack Has two Wisdom DC rolls with an extremely high DC (15) The Player Character Flind will talk to would be the closest party member. It is recommended to have a character that has a high Wisdom like Shadowheart or a Wisdom build character as this will be a difficult wisdom roll. Gale +Astarion + Karlach - Flind The Risen Road - Cave Entrance in the middle of the Risen Road. Foll
